overview: In 2018, Brazilian band Expurgo was invited to play in the Obscene Extreme Festival, in Czech Republic, and went on a tour through the interior of Europe. In their luggage, the group took 15 years of stories, friendship and extreme music. The documentary gathers testimonies, behind-the-scenes footage and the concerts of the Minas Gerais band on their first tour of Europe.
tagline: IF HORROR MOVIES THRILLED YOU... THIS ONE WILL GRIND YOUR SOUL!
title: Expurgo: Deforming Europe
